name: white-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A glass flute that lures wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: A glass flute that lures wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A white glass flute. When blown, it makes wild POKéMON more likely to appear.
